title: Windows 11 build 22572 comes with Family app and Clipchamp video editor
content:
Like clockwork, Microsoft has released its weekly build of Windows 11 to Insider enrolled in the Dev channel. This time around, we’re getting Windows 11 build 22572 and it comes with a couple of new apps installed out of the box. The new apps are Family and Clipchamp. Family is an app that allows you

The post Windows 11 build 22572 comes with Family app and Clipchamp video editor appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has released Windows 11 build 22572 to Insiders in the Dev channel, with a new Family app and Clipchamp installed out of the box.
